item.title: Is my project failing?
item.description: In today’s article, I’m going to talk about things that I’ve seen over the years that slowly were contributing to the failure of a project, and how to avoid it.

item.title: Building an engineering team
item.description: In today’s article, I’m going to share my thoughts on how to build a Dev team, what does it take, and how you can tell if you built a good team, as well as what is a good team.

item.title: 2020 Resolutions
item.description: Every year we make some kind of promise, well, this year I made a resolution to create a new blog after a while without writing to any blogs.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m Alex, a Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience.

item.title: Donate
item.description: Donations for my contributions are always welcome, but if you can contribute back to the open source community is even better.
